text: Menna van Praag is an English novelist and journalist. == Biography == Menna van Praag was born in Cambridge and studied modern history at the University of Oxford. She worked as a waitress and struggled with being overweight. Her mother and teacher inspired her life. Her novella, a fable, Men, Money and Chocolate (2009) has already been translated into 26 languages. She currently lives in England with her husband, who runs a vegetarian cafe. == References == Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:English journalists Category:English women non-fiction writers Category:English women novelists Category:Living people Category:People from Cambridge Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Menna van Praag
